CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
OldVersion.description: Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Watermark support for recording playback (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Recording can now be enabled for watermarked meetings. An email ID will be displayed as the watermark during the meeting recording playback. Once a meeting has concluded, users can access the recorded content on both web and mobile platforms to watch the recording with watermarking.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Watermark support for recording playback (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Recording can now be enabled for watermarked meetings. An email ID will be displayed as the watermark during the meeting recording playback. Once a meeting has concluded, users can access the recorded content on both web and mobile platforms to watch the recording with watermarking.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
OldVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
CurrentVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
OldVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Language selection for users
CurrentVersion.description: Users can select their preferred language within the Viva learning Setting Menu, independent of Teams or Browser language. Preferred language will be persisted across all Viva Learning Surfaces.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Language selection for users
OldVersion.description: Users can select their preferred language within the Viva learning Setting Menu, independent of Teams or Browser language. Preferred language will be persisted across all Viva Learning Surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights delegate access for leaders
CurrentVersion.description: New delegate access allows leaders to empower other individuals to view insights about their organization. Those with delegated access will be able to easily navigate to the leader's view of organizational insights.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights delegate access for leaders
OldVersion.description: New delegate access allows leaders to empower other individuals to view insights about their organization. Those with delegated access will be able to easily navigate to the leader's view of organizational insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights leader deep-dive reports focus on customers, business operations and agility
CurrentVersion.description: There will be a new report for leaders in Viva Insights app in Teams tied to business outcomes. Leaders can view a bundle of relevant metrics and suggested actions. Leaders can further drill down by customizing the filters such as time periods, benchmarks, scopes, view insights breakdown by groups within their organization, and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights leader deep-dive reports focus on customers, business operations and agility
OldVersion.description: There will be a new report for leaders in Viva Insights app in Teams tied to business outcomes. Leaders can view a bundle of relevant metrics and suggested actions. Leaders can further drill down by customizing the filters such as time periods, benchmarks, scopes, view insights breakdown by groups within their organization, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- New reports page
CurrentVersion.description:
,A new reports page will be available in Insider Risk Management. The three charts available on the alerts page -- including total alerts that need review, average time to resolve alerts, and alerts summary -- will be moving to the new reports page.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- New reports page
OldVersion.description:
,A new reports page will be available in Insider Risk Management. The three charts available on the alerts page -- including total alerts that need review, average time to resolve alerts, and alerts summary -- will be moving to the new reports page.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - In-app search relevance improvement to increase matching results
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning in-app Search will be improved to show more relevant and matching results at the top.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - In-app search relevance improvement to increase matching results
OldVersion.description: Viva Learning in-app Search will be improved to show more relevant and matching results at the top.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp content
CurrentVersion.description: Content improves your ability to create engaging and inspiring videos using Clipchamp. This feature includes stock videos and images, music, shapes, graphics and annotations and is available via web only for the following Microsoft 365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard, and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp content
OldVersion.description: Content improves your ability to create engaging and inspiring videos using Clipchamp. This feature includes stock videos and images, music, shapes, graphics and annotations and is available via web only for the following Microsoft 365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard, and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line
CurrentVersion.description: With private line, users will be able to have a private second phone number that they can make available to a select set of callers to call them directly, bypassing delegates, admins, or assistants. Inbound calls to the private line will be distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone. The private line will support incoming calls only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line
OldVersion.description:
WithÂ private line, users will be able to have a private second
phone number that they can make available to a select set of callers to call
them directly, bypassing delegates, admins, or assistants. Inbound calls to the
private line will be distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone. The
private line will support incoming calls only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
OldVersion.description:
,
This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Admin policy for enabling/disabling tenant users to join externally hosted meetings
CurrentVersion.description: As an admin, you can control which meetings your org users can attend - only internally hosted meetings or externally hosted meetings as well. This can help your org to meet compliance needs and strengthen controls around Teams meetings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Admin policy for enabling/disabling tenant users to join externally hosted meetings
OldVersion.description: As an admin, you can control which meetings your org users can attend - only internally hosted meetings or externally hosted meetings as well. This can help your org to meet compliance needs and strengthen controls around Teams meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
CurrentVersion.description: This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
OldVersion.description: This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
OldVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Aggregated Reactions Count in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We will be showing the count of Reactions aggregated across all items in the conversation in the Message List. This new feature will be available on Outlook on the web and the New Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Aggregated Reactions Count in Message List in new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: We will be showing the count of Reactions aggregated across all items in the conversation in the Message List. This new feature will be available on Outlook on the web and the New Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - File Name and File Path filters for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: We are enhancing the filtering experience for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal with the capability to filter the DLP alerts queues by File Name or File Path.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - File Name and File Path filters for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
OldVersion.description: We are enhancing the filtering experience for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal with the capability to filter the DLP alerts queues by File Name or File Path.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: High Volume Email for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: ,High Volume Email is a new service for line of business applications and other high-volume SMTP scenarios that enables you to send internal messages beyond the current limits of Exchange Online.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
CurrentVersion.description: ,This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Describe it to design it within Teams Workflows
CurrentVersion.description: Can't find a workflow template that matches what you need? You will now be able to describe in detail on how you want your automation to work and from that description generate a workflow to match your needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: A single desktop app for all user types
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams on Windows and Mac will support every type of Teams account (work, school or personal) in a single desktop application.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Answers Intelligent Importer
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to upload documents and use AI to generate question and answer pairs from that content within Answers and communities on Engage for premium users. Answers Intelligent Importer aims to transform static to dynamic, fostering active engagement and interactive conversations. This approach also facilitates the easy retrieval and reuse of generated answers, preventing them from getting lost within the depths of a document.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: In-product feedback button
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing an in-product feedback button to SharePoint, coherent with the rest of the M365 suite. This will provide the option to submit compliments, problems, or suggestions about UI/UX and feature functionality to Microsoft.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for town hall
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for town halls.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Collapsible Date Headers on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: You now can collapse and expand the date headers in the Message List when you've chosen "Show date headers in the message list" in your Settings. Collapse all emails from "This week" to quickly get to the rest of the emails from "This month."

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Redesigned Message Bars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Infobars on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows are redesigned to be more effective at conveying relevant information and communicating possible actions. They are also dismissible in the Compose form.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Browser-optimized playback for SAP SuccessFactors content
CurrentVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Browser-optimized playback for SAP SuccessFactors content
OldVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: The Room Remote feature users to control a nearby shared meeting room device from their Windows desktop/PC companion device via the Teams client. This feature first launched on mobile devices and will now be available on Windows PC form factors when joined to the meeting as a companion device.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop
OldVersion.description:

Room Remote feature users to control a nearby shared meeting room device from

factors when joined to the meeting as a companion device.
